ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You are absoutely right.  I was in the Lord s room and Frenzied room just the other night.  Here s what I mean: /g SWORD!  He s got the sword. [insert
ygData.messageBody:
>LOL - you really meant 45-50th bard for those items?
>Those items fall within those level ranges and are very
>acquireable by a NON-TWINKED bard at lvl 40+.

You are absoutely right. I was in the Lord's room and
Frenzied room just the other night. Here's what I mean:

/g SWORD! He's got the sword.

[insert battle here]

/g Wooohoo!!!
/shout YKESHA!

Party says 'Who gets it? Someone who can use it. No casters
and the bard doesn't need it. Here Warrior.'

---

Who in their right mind is gonna give a bard a Ykesha or fbbs?
Twinked: someone handed those items to the person through guild
connections. Plus going on their knowledge alone, I would say
they didnt earn them (or someone bought an Ebay account, muhaha)

Sorry for the confusion. =)

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
